Description: While 2024 is a still a work in progress, it already feels like half a year has gone by. I started the year off in Sweden for Christmas, followed by a quick trip to London before retunring to New York for my second semester at Parsons. It has been an intense semester so far but nearing the end, I can't wait to see what opportunities are ahead.

This past year felt like a blur. I was pretty stuck in to the final semester of my undergraduate studies which accumulaed in an amazing showcase of all my classmates incredible capstones. I then took some time out to backpack in Europe before moving to New York to start my Master's degree. The year certainly had its ups and downs but I feel that I came out stronger.

As you will see there are a few gaps in this year. This is primarily down to be being unindated with work and assignments between college and internships that I did not feel like I had 'exciting' moments to capture. However, I am trying to be better at embracing the ordinary as well. During my summer internship I discovered that my passion for design lies more specifically in product and ux which was an exciting discovery.

This timeline represents moments of my life from 2022 to 2024. In the span of two years I have seen the world deal with a pandemic, graduated from my undergrad and travelled to thirteen different countries. As I continue adding to my timeline, I am excited to see where the road will take me.
